properties.name: length
properties.description: The number of objects in the collection.

parameters.name: horizontalScaleFactor
parameters.description: The horizontal scale factor of the transformation matrix (Optional)

parameters.name: verticalScaleFactor
parameters.description: The vertical scale factor of the transformation matrix (Optional)

parameters.name: clockwiseShearAngle
parameters.description: The shear angle of the transformation matrix (Optional)

parameters.name: counterclockwiseRotationAngle
parameters.description: The rotation angle of the transformation matrix (Optional)

parameters.name: horizontalTranslation
parameters.description: The horizontal translation of the transformation matrix (Optional)

parameters.name: verticalTranslation
parameters.description: The vertical translation of the transformation matrix (Optional)

parameters.name: matrixValues
parameters.description: The values of the transformation matrix (Optional)

parameters.name: matrixMapping
parameters.description: The mapping the transformation matrix performs on the unit triangle. Can accept: Array of Array of 2 Arrays of 2 Reals. (Optional)

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.description: Initial values for properties of the new TransformationMatrix (Optional)

methods.name: count
methods.description: Displays the number of elements in the TransformationMatrix.

methods.name: item

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

methods.description: Returns the TransformationMatrix with the specified index or name.

methods.name: itemByName
methods.description: Returns the TransformationMatrix with the specified name.

methods.name: itemByRange

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The TransformationMatrix, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: TransformationMatrix, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The TransformationMatrix, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: TransformationMatrix, Long Integer or String.

methods.description: Returns the TransformationMatrices within the specified range.

methods.name: firstItem
methods.description: Returns the first TransformationMatrix in the collection.

methods.name: lastItem
methods.description: Returns the last TransformationMatrix in the collection.

methods.name: middleItem
methods.description: Returns the middle TransformationMatrix in the collection.

methods.name: previousItem

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The index of the TransformationMatrix that follows the desired TransformationMatrix.

methods.description: Returns the TransformationMatrix with the index previous to the specified index.

methods.name: nextItem

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The TransformationMatrix whose index comes before the desired TransformationMatrix.

methods.description: Returns the TransformationMatrix whose index follows the specified TransformationMatrix in the collection.

methods.name: anyItem
methods.description: Returns any TransformationMatrix in the collection.

methods.name: everyItem
methods.description: Returns every TransformationMatrix in the collection.

methods.name: toSource
methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the TransformationMatrix.
Returns the TransformationMatrix with the specified index.
